metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    how many additional classroom blocks have been constructed at Lumimba Day Secondary School in Lumezi Parliamentary Constituency following its upgrading;
(b)    whether construction works have been completed and, if not, why;
(c)    what the cost of constructing additional classroom blocks was; and
(d)    if no additional infrastructure has been constructed, why.
(a)    what has caused the delay in commencing rehabilitation works on Mungulube-Mulumbi road in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    when the rehabilitation works will commence.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing what the average total cost of sinking one borehole and installing the Indian Mark II hand pump is.
Minister of Agriculture whether the procured solar powered grinding mills will be owned by the Government.

parts: (a)    what the total cost of constructing the Kazungula Bridge at Kazungula Border Post is;
(b)    what the name of the contractor for the project is;
(c)    whether any other facilities will be constructed at the Border Post;
(d)    if so, what these facilities are; and

(e)    when construction of the Bridge will be completed.
